body:
There are other cards that could do with some version of the 'Cast SN with AI' conditions.

Cards that target a player but affect another zone. ie. Repopulate - Shuffle all creature cards from target player's graveyard into that player's library.

The AI will cast this regardless of the contents of a players' graveyard. Whether it's own or the opponents.
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Other Cast with AI situations
content:
_From [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/) on August 28, 2014 05:43:44_

There are other cards that could do with some version of the 'Cast SN with AI' conditions.

Cards that target a player but affect another zone. ie. Repopulate - Shuffle all creature cards from target player's graveyard into that player's library.

The AI will cast this regardless of the contents of a players' graveyard. Whether it's own or the opponents.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=666_
